svg.style: font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; background-color: white; text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;

text.tspan: The number of estimated paralytic polio cases by world region
These estimates are based on a model by Tebbens et al. (2011) that multiplies the reported number of cases with a
correction factor based on the quality of each country's surveillance system. After a country is certified polio-free,
however, the reported polio cases are used.
Source: WHO (2018) and Tebbens et al. (2011)
